  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_458</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_458</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Sucesiones y cotas</string>
            <string language="en">Bounded sequences</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesprungene Reihenfolgen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ordres liés</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seqüências limitadas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sequenze limitate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οριακές ακολουθίες</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones los conceptos de supremo e ínfimo de un conjunto de números reales. Se introducen en primer lugar las ideas de conjuntos acotados superior e inferiormente y se acaba con la idea de sucesión de números reales acotada.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain the concept of supremum and infimum of a set of real numbers. The first step is the introduction of the ideas of sets of real numbers bounded from above and from below. The unit ends with the idea of a bounded sequence of real numbers.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">supremo</string>
            <string language="en">supremum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">acotado</string>
            <string language="en">bounded</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sucesión</string>
            <string language="en">sequence</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cota superior</string>
            <string language="en">upper bound</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">ínfimo</string>
            <string language="en">infimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cota inferior</string>
            <string language="en">lower bound</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept von supremum und infimum eines Sets realer 
Zahlen zu erklären. Der erste Jobstep ist die Einleitung der 
Ideen der Sets der realen Zahlen gesprungen von oben genanntem und von
unterhalb. Die Maßeinheit beendet mit der Idee einer 
gesprungenen Reihenfolge der realen Zahlen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'expliquer le concept du supremum et l'infimum d'un 
ensemble de vrais nombres. La première étape est 
l'introduction des idées des ensembles de vrais nombres liés de 
ci-dessus et de dessous. L'unité termine avec l'idée d'un 
ordre lié de vrais nombres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações explicar 
o conceito do supremum e o infimum de um jogo de números reais. 
A primeira etapa é a introdução das idéias dos jogos dos 
números reais limitados de acima e de abaixo. A unidade termina
com a idéia de uma seqüência limitada de números reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
spiegare il concetto del supremum ed infimum di un insieme dei numeri 
reali. Il primo punto è l'introduzione delle idee degli insiemi
dei numeri reali limitati da suddetto e da sotto. L'unità si 
conclude con l'idea di una sequenza limitata dei numeri reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εξηγήσει την έννοια του supremum και του infimum ενός 
συνόλου πραγματικών αριθμών. Το πρώτο βήμα είναι η 
εισαγωγή των ιδεών των συνόλων πραγματικών αριθμών οριακών από 
ανωτέρω και από κάτω από. Η μονάδα τελειώνει με την ιδέα 
μιας οριακής ακολουθίας πραγματικών αριθμών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">supremum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gesprungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reihenfolge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">oberes Limit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">infimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterere Schranke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">supremum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lié</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ordre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite supérieure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">infimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">limite inférieure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">supremum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">limitado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">seqüência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">limite superior</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">infimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">limite mais baixo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">supremum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">limite superiore</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">infimum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">limite più basso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">supremum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χαμηλότερος συνδεδεμένος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
